name: Makeup Stylist:DIY Makeup Game
description:
💄Do you dream of becoming a makeup artist? Have you been looking for a fun makeover fashion salon games for girls？Makeup Styling is exactly what you are waiting for! Choose your favorite model and give her a stunning makeup!

💋 In this beauty salon, you can experience the real makeup process. Tons of tools for you to discover, use facial cleanser to do a skin massage before makeup, choose different cosmetics to create fashion makeups, Style your costomers with clothing, hairstyles and accessories to match her look!

💅Game Features:
1. Free to play princess makeup games.
2. Complete all makeup operations with one finger.
3. A variety of cosmetics for you to choose from, such as: lipsticks, eyeliner, Powder, mascara, and eye-shadow.
4. You can save and share your makeup creations with friends

Here comes a new customer，let's refresh her with a bling-bling lip art, an ambilight eye shadow and a perfectly matched hairstyle and outfit!
